@graph.caption: This recipe for vegan red lentil dahl has been adapted from an amazing book by Rebecca Katz called The Cancer-Fighting Kitchen.

@graph.name: Vegan Red Lentil Dahl « Dora's Table
@graph.description: This recipe for vegan red lentil dahl has been adapted from an amazing book by Rebecca Katz called The Cancer-Fighting Kitchen.

@graph.name: Dora S.
@graph.description: Dora is the founder, recipe developer, and photographer at Dora's Table and Mi Mero Mole. Born and raised in Mexico and a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America in New York, she adopted a vegan (plant-based) diet to take control of her health.

@graph.name: Vegan Red Lentil Dahl
@graph.description: This recipe for lentil dahl is one of my favorites. You can serve it with basmati rice, a salad, and some kind of flatbread.

recipeInstructions.text: Set a large pot to medium heat and add oil. Add the cumin and mustard seeds and saute until they begin to pop, then quickly add onion, ginger, turmeric, ground cumin, and a pinch of salt. Saute until onion begins to soften, about 3 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Set a large pot to medium heat and add oil. Add the cumin and mustard seeds and saute until they begin to pop, then quickly add onion, ginger, turmeric, ground cumin, and a pinch of salt. Saute until onion begins to soften, about 3 min.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes and saute for 2 more minutes. Pour in ½ cup of broth and reduce by half.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomatoes and saute for 2 more minutes. Pour in ½ cup of broth and reduce by half.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the red lentils and stir, then add remaining broth, and cinnamon stick. Bring to a boíl, then turn heat down to a simmer, cover and let cook for 30 min. or until tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the red lentils and stir, then add remaining broth, and cinnamon stick. Bring to a boíl, then turn heat down to a simmer, cover and let cook for 30 min. or until tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Add salt and let simmer for another 5 min. Remove the cinnamon stick and pour in lime juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Add salt and let simmer for another 5 min. Remove the cinnamon stick and pour in lime juice.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, puree the soup until very smooth. Adjust consistency according to preference with more broth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, puree the soup until very smooth. Adjust consistency according to preference with more broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Return soup to pot and reheat. Serve with chopped cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Return soup to pot and reheat. Serve with chopped cilantro.

@graph.keywords: red lentil dahl, vegan red lentil dahl
